column5: First timed aimed for Carp and got hooked. Landed 6 and lost 4-5 more, most over 5+ lb.  I have yet to catch my trout this year. In the mean time, I have decided to aimed for carp, and I am hooked.  I landed 6 out of 10 fish on monday. The largest being 10lb+. We were using corn the whole time. I can get used to this if it was not difficult in the past. We were all using hair rig and corn.  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/b...album/carp4.jpg  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/b...album/carp3.jpg  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/b...album/carp2.jpg  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/b...album/carp1.jpg   The other OFC buddy sharper caught a 25+lb carp. Here is the catch  http://i223.photobucket.com/albums/dd294/b.../IMG_0018-1.jpg
congrats on a great outing...  can't see the pics though ... it's because of the "b...album" .. on the right bottom corner of the photobucket there should be a "URL link" for u
The fish are not fighting hard yet, just heavy due to its weight, water was still very cold everywhere.  Images are fix! Thanks for the reminder
beauties!  the fish in the 2nd pic looks pretty ticked off  usually they have the "bleh who cares if I get caught" face ...  do i sound crazy? man i need to go get one.
Fun trying to land a big carp over the handrails there eh? P.S.  Rumour has it at night there's a few big cats that come into that spot.
